name: Hector: Badge of Carnage! Episode 3 - Beyond Reasonable Doom
name_original: Hector: Badge of Carnage! Episode 3 - Beyond Reasonable Doom
description:
Hector: Badge of Carnage! Episode 3 - Beyond Reasonable Doom is an adventure game developed by Straandlooper Animation. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Telltale Games.
You can play Hector: Badge of Carnage! Episode 3 - Beyond Reasonable Doom on PC.
